paper_abstract: Sequential pattern mining is one of the important techniques of data mining to discover some potential useful knowledge from large databases. However, existing approaches for mining sequential patterns are designed for point-based events. In many applications, the essence of events are interval-based, such as disease suffered, stock price increase or decrease, chatting etc. This paper presents a new algorithm to discover temporal pattern from temporal sequences database consisting of interval-based events.
paper_title: Mining temporal patterns from sequence database of interval-based events
